GR14satvtanu:210: dhātrā yadā sapaśugopaśiśau praṇīte buddher bhramo halabhṛto 'bhavad aprameyaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:211: tat saṃharan sapaśupālakulasvarūpaṃ kṛtvā vidhiṃ vividhamohamalāt sa dhartā // SatvT_2.51
GR14satvtanu:214: kaṃsasya raṅgasadanaṃ sabale praṇīte svāphalkinā bhavadhanus tarasā vibhajya /
GR14satvtanu:215: cāṇūraśūraśamanaṃ sahakaṃsamājau kartā dvipaṃ kuvalayaṃ sahasā nihatya // SatvT_2.53
GR14satvtanu:216: sāṃdīpanaṃ mṛtasutaṃ gurudakṣiṇārthī dattvā jarāsutabalaṃ yavanaṃ ca hatvā /
GR14satvtanu:217: śrīrukmiṇīprabhṛtidāraśataṃ vivāhya tābhyaḥ sutān daśadaśānu janiṣyati sma // SatvT_2.54
GR14satvtanu:218: bhaumaṃ nihatya sagaṇaṃ divi devamātur dātuṃ tadīyamaṇikuṇḍalam ādidevaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:219: gatvā surendratarurājavaraṃ priyāyāḥ prītau samuddharaṇato ditijān sa jetā // SatvT_2.55
GR14satvtanu:220: bāṇāsurasya samare mama vīryanāśāl labdhāmaratvam adhikaṃ yudhi bhūpabandhūn /
GR14satvtanu:221: jitvā yudhiṣṭhiranṛpakratunā vivāhabījaṃ nipātya gurubhārataraṃ prahartā // SatvT_2.56
GR14satvtanu:222: loke pradarśya sutarāṃ dvijadevapūjāṃ svasyāpy apārakaruṇāṃ nijasevakebhyaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:223: trātvā parīkṣitanṛpaṃ paramāstradagdhaṃ pārthāya bhūtim avalokayitā dvijārthe // SatvT_2.57
GR14satvtanu:224: kāmena snehabhayarāgakuṭubasaṃdhe yasmin mano nivasataḥ śamalaṃ nirasya /
GR14satvtanu:225: dātā svarūpam amalaṃ pariśuddhabhāvaḥ sākṣāt svarūpaniratasya ca kiṃ nu vakṣye // SatvT_2.58
GR14satvtanu:226: yat pādapaṅkajaparāgaparāyaṇānām agre cakāsti na ca muktisukhaṃ nitāntam /
GR14satvtanu:227: kiṃ vānyadarpitabhayaṃ khalu kālavegaiḥ sākṣān mahāsukhasamudragatāntarāṇām // SatvT_2.59
GR14satvtanu:228: gaṅgāditīrthatapahomavratādikebhyaḥ kīrtiṃ svakīyam adhikāṃ samudīrya loke /
GR14satvtanu:229: atyunnataṃ dvijakulaṃ dvijaśāpavyājād dhatvā svalokam amalaṃ tanunābhigantā // SatvT_2.60
GR14satvtanu:230: tasmād bhaviṣyati sutaḥ sukhado janānāṃ pradyumnasaṃjña urugāyaguṇānurūpaḥ // SatvT_2.61
GR14satvtanu:231: kartā mudaṃ muditavaktrasucārugātraiḥ pātrair ivāmṛtapayo manujān pracchan /
GR14satvtanu:233: yasmād uṣāharaṇato bhujavīryanāśād bāṇo bhaviṣyati śivānugaśāntadehaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:234: vyāsād bhaviṣyati [... au2 ṇeichenjh] bhagavān araṇyāṃ yogī janān prati gadiṣyati vedasāram // SatvT_2.63
GR14satvtanu:235: śrīmatsuśāntam amalaṃ bhagavatpraṇītaṃ yac chraddhayā kalijanā api yānti śāntim /
GR14satvtanu:236: buddhāvatāram adhigamya kalāvalakṣair veṣair mater ativimohakaraṃ pralobham // SatvT_2.64
GR14satvtanu:237: pākhaṇḍaśāstram adhikalpya suradviṣāṇāṃ kartā jinasya tanayo bhagavān gayāyām /
GR14satvtanu:238: pākhaṇḍaśāstrabahule nijavedamārge naṣṭe dvijātibhir asatpathi vartamāne // SatvT_2.65
GR14satvtanu:240: sākṣād bhaviṣyati sarasvatisaṃjñitāyāṃ śrīsārvabhauma iti vedagupo dvijāgryāt // SatvT_2.66
GR14satvtanu:241: kṛtvā puraṃdaraśriyaṃ balaye 'tidāsyan goptāṣṭame manuyuge viditānubhāvaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:242: āyuḥ karo navamanoḥ samaye janānāṃ nītiṃ vidhātum amarārivināśanāya // SatvT_2.67
GR14satvtanu:243: goptā bhaviṣyati jagajjanadhārayāsau bhūtvā śrutendrasahito bhagavān apāraḥ /
GR14satvtanu:244: bhūtvā viśūcisadane dvijarājaśambhoḥ sāhityakarmaparavān daśame 'ntare saḥ // SatvT_2.68
GR14satvtanu:245: pātāmarān [... au3 ṇeichenjh] viśvak [... au1 ṇeichenjh] senasaṃjño yat sainyapūgasamarād amarārināśaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:246: manvantaraikadaśame 'rthakariprapautraḥ śrīdharmasetur iti viśruta ādidevaḥ // SatvT_2.69
GR14satvtanu:247: hatvāsurān surapatau vidhṛter apatye dātā tṛtīyabhavanaṃ bhagavān svayambhūḥ /
GR14satvtanu:248: jāto dviṣaṇmanuyuge yugapālanāya viprāt svaśaktimahasaḥ sunṛtākhyato vai // SatvT_2.70
GR14satvtanu:249: khyāto bhaviṣyati tato bhagavān svadhāmā yasmāj janā jagati saukhyam apāram āpuḥ /
GR14satvtanu:250: bhāvye trayodaśayuge bhavitādidevaḥ śrīdevahotratanayo bhagavān bṛhatyām // SatvT_2.71
GR14satvtanu:251: yogeśvaro divi divaspatiśakramitro yogād ameyavapuṣā sa vitānatulyaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:252: satrāyaṇasya sadane bhagavān anādidevo 'pi devavanitātanayo 'bhijātaḥ // SatvT_2.72
GR14satvtanu:254: ete mayā bhagavataḥ kathitā dvijāte śuddhāvatāranicayā jagato hitārthāḥ /
GR14satvtanu:257: tam ahaṃ śaraṇaṃ yāmi kṛṣṇaṃ brahmāṇḍanāyakam // SatvT_2.74
GR14satvtanu:263: katham aṃśakalābhāga etad varṇaya no vibho // SatvT_3.2
GR14satvtanu:265: satyam uktaṃ tvayā brahman kṛṣṇasya jagadātmanaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:266: avatāreṣu sarveṣu bhedād aṃśakalāḥ svataḥ // SatvT_3.3
GR14satvtanu:268: avikārād acyutāc ca nirbhedād brahmarūpiṇaḥ // SatvT_3.4
GR14satvtanu:272: tathāpi kāryataḥ kecid dṛśyante na hi sarvataḥ // SatvT_3.6
GR14satvtanu:273: aiśvaryajñānadharmāś ca vairāgyaṃ śrīr yaśas tathā /
GR14satvtanu:274: eṣāṃ saṃdarśanāt sākṣāt pūrṇo vidvadbhir ucyate // SatvT_3.7
GR14satvtanu:277: aṃśas turīyo bhāgaḥ syāt kalā tu ṣoḍaśī matā /
GR14satvtanu:278: śatabhāgo vibhūtiś ca varṇyate kavibhiḥ pṛthak // SatvT_3.9
GR14satvtanu:280: yaśasaḥ pṛthagbhedaṃ mattaḥ śṛṇu dvijottama // SatvT_3.10
GR14satvtanu:282: eṣāṃ jñānaṃ vadanty aṅga jñānaṃ ṣaḍvidham uttamam // SatvT_3.11
GR14satvtanu:283: satyaṃ śaucaṃ dayā maunaṃ dharmaś cāturvidhaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:284: amāno vyatirekaś ca aindriyas tu vaśīkṛtaḥ // SatvT_3.12
GR14satvtanu:286: aṇimā laghimā caiva mahimā tadanantaram // SatvT_3.13
GR14satvtanu:287: prākāmyaṃ caiva prāptiś ca īśitā vaśitā tathā /
GR14satvtanu:288: kāmasyāvasitā hy ete aṣṭaiśvaryāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // SatvT_3.14
GR14satvtanu:291: gṛhā bhūr astraśastre ca durgādyāḥ śriya īritāḥ /
GR14satvtanu:292: yaśas tu puṃso bhavati karmato guṇatas tathā // SatvT_3.16
GR14satvtanu:296: tathāpy ahaṃ dviṣaṣṭhīṃ te varṇayāmy anupūrvaśaḥ // SatvT_3.18
GR14satvtanu:297: brahmaṇyaś ca śaraṇyaś ca bhaktavātsalyam eva ca /
GR14satvtanu:301: śauryam audāryam āstikyaṃ sthairyaṃ dhairyaṃ prasannatā /
GR14satvtanu:302: gāmbhīryaṃ praśrayaḥ śīlaṃ prāgalbhyam ṛtamaṅgalam // SatvT_3.21
GR14satvtanu:303: śamo damo balaṃ dākṣyaṃ kṣemaṃ harṣo 'nahaṃkṛtiḥ /
GR14satvtanu:304: saṃtoṣa ārjavaṃ sāmyaṃ manobhāgyaṃ śrutaṃ sukham // SatvT_3.22
GR14satvtanu:305: tyāgo bhayaṃ pāvanaṃ ca tejaḥ kauśalam āśrayaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:306: dhṛtiḥ kṣamā smṛtir lajjā śraddhā maitrī dayonnatiḥ // SatvT_3.23
GR14satvtanu:307: śāntiḥ puṣṭiḥ svavākśuddhir buddhir vidyā svarakṣatā /
GR14satvtanu:308: ete te bhagabhedās tu kathitā hy anupūrvaśaḥ // SatvT_3.24
GR14satvtanu:309: eṣāṃ prakāśo yatrāsīt sa pūrṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:310: aṃśaprakāśād aṃśaḥ syāt kalāyās tu kalā smṛtā // SatvT_3.25
GR14satvtanu:311: vibhūtes tu vibhūtiḥ syād eṣa bhedo na hi svataḥ /
GR14satvtanu:314: yataḥ kṛṣṇāvatāreṇa bhagabhedāḥ pṛthak pṛthak // SatvT_3.27
GR14satvtanu:317: darśitā bhagabhedā vai tasmād aṃśāḥ prakīrtitāḥ /
GR14satvtanu:320: tathā śuklādayo hy āvirbhāvā ṛṣabha ātmavān // SatvT_3.30
GR14satvtanu:325: gayaḥ pṛthuś ca bharataḥ śaktiyuktāḥ kalā matāḥ /
GR14satvtanu:326: guṇāvatārā brahmādyās tadaṃśā ye vibhūtayaḥ // SatvT_3.33
GR14satvtanu:329: na brahmaṇo bhidā vipra śrīkṛṣṇasya ca sattama /
GR14satvtanu:330: nārāyaṇasya vā saumya hy avatārisvarūpiṇaḥ // SatvT_3.35
GR14satvtanu:333: kiṃ brahma paramaṃ sākṣāt kiṃ vā nārāyaṇo vibhuḥ // SatvT_3.36
GR14satvtanu:335: kim ekatattvam eteṣām athavā kiṃ pṛthak pṛthak // SatvT_3.37
GR14satvtanu:337: śṛṇu tat paramaṃ guhyaṃ brahmadāyāda sattama /
GR14satvtanu:338: avatārisvarūpaṃ me yathā varṇayato dvija // SatvT_3.39
GR14satvtanu:339: ekam eva paraṃ tattvam avatāri sanātanam /
GR14satvtanu:342: tathā śrīkṛṣṇadevasya brahmaṇaḥ puruṣasya ca // SatvT_3.41
GR14satvtanu:344: śrīkṛṣṇākhyaṃ paraṃ dhāma paramānandam uttamam // SatvT_3.42
GR14satvtanu:348: vadanti brahma paramaṃ prakāśātmakam avyayam // SatvT_3.44
GR14satvtanu:354: anantaśaktiṃ sarveṣāṃ puruṣaṃ prakṛteḥ param // SatvT_3.47
GR14satvtanu:357: ataḥ kṛṣṇasya devasya brahmaṇaḥ puruṣasya ca /
GR14satvtanu:358: vastuto naiva bhedo hi varṇyate tair api dvija // SatvT_3.49
GR14satvtanu:360: tathā sa bhagavān kṛṣṇo nāneva paricakṣate // SatvT_3.50
GR14satvtanu:366: muktyādyarthaṃ nṛlokasya mānuṣatvaṃ yato gataḥ // SatvT_3.53
GR14satvtanu:367: atas taṃ puruṣā nityaṃ bhaktibhedena nityadā /
GR14satvtanu:368: bhajanti hy apavargeśaṃ pareśaṃ tadakāmyayā // SatvT_3.54
GR14satvtanu:369: mayā te kathitā vipra avatārā mahātmanaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:370: kim anyat kathayāmy adya tvaṃ hi bhāgavatottamaḥ // SatvT_3.55
GR14satvtanu:373: nāsti tṛptiḥ śṛṇvato me tava vāgamṛtaṃ hareḥ /
GR14satvtanu:375: tathāpi sāmprataṃ hy etac chrutvā kautūhalaṃ mama /
GR14satvtanu:376: bhaktibhedaṃ bhagavato bhāvanīyaṃ sadā nṛbhiḥ // SatvT_4.2
GR14satvtanu:377: brūhi me bhagavan viṣṇor bhaktibhedaṃ sadāśiva /
GR14satvtanu:378: yaj jñātvā hy añjasā viṣṇoḥ sāmyaṃ yāti janaḥ prabho // SatvT_4.3
GR14satvtanu:380: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā sādho paraṃ guhyatamaṃ yataḥ /
GR14satvtanu:381: anyasmai na mayā proktaṃ vinā bhāgavatān narāt // SatvT_4.4
GR14satvtanu:382: yadaivāvocaṃ māṃ kṛṣṇo dhyānāt tuṣṭamanā vibhuḥ /
GR14satvtanu:384: tadā cāhaṃ tasya pādapaṅkaje śirasā nataḥ /
GR14satvtanu:385: babhāṣa etad bhagavān bhaktān nirdeṣṭum arhasi // SatvT_4.6
GR14satvtanu:386: tadā prītamanā devo mām uvāca satāṃ gatiḥ /
GR14satvtanu:387: śṛṇuṣva śiva bhadraṃ te bhaktān vakṣyāmi sātvatān // SatvT_4.7
GR14satvtanu:389: bhaktān jānīhi me deva sarvalokapraṇāmakān // SatvT_4.8
GR14satvtanu:391: bravīmi śiva te bhaktis tenaiva samprasidhyati // SatvT_4.9
GR14satvtanu:392: yadi tvadvākyaniṣṭhaḥ syād yo 'pi ko 'pi sadāśiva /
GR14satvtanu:393: tasmai prītamanā vācyo bhaktibhedaḥ sasādhanaḥ // SatvT_4.10
GR14satvtanu:394: tad idaṃ te pravakṣyāmi bhaktibhedaṃ sasādhanam /
GR14satvtanu:396: ekaiva bhaktiḥ śrīviṣṇoḥ prītir ity ucyate budhaiḥ /
GR14satvtanu:398: kiṃ tu jñānakriyālīlābhedaiḥ sā trividhā matā /
GR14satvtanu:399: tān śṛṇuṣvānupūrvyeṇa mattaḥ svavahito dvija // SatvT_4.13
GR14satvtanu:401: sā nirguṇajñānamayī sākṣād api garīyasī // SatvT_4.14
GR14satvtanu:405: satsaṅgajānyāsād grāhyā sarvadā sā hy anuttamā // SatvT_4.16
GR14satvtanu:407: yām āśritya samāpnoti jano bhaktiṃ janārdane // SatvT_4.17
GR14satvtanu:413: sameṣu mitrabhāvena dīneṣu dayayā tathā // SatvT_4.20
GR14satvtanu:415: bhūteṣu bhagavaddṛṣṭyā nirguṇā bhaktir ucyate // SatvT_4.21
GR14satvtanu:416: labdhvā tāṃ nirguṇāṃ bhaktiṃ muktiṃ cāpi na manyate /
GR14satvtanu:419: yat sarvayatnataḥ kāryaṃ puruṣeṇa manīṣiṇā // SatvT_4.23
GR14satvtanu:422: vācoccāro harer nāmnāṃ karṇābhyāṃ karmaṇāṃ śrutiḥ /
GR14satvtanu:427: dṛṣṭvā viṣṇujanādīnām īkṣaṇaṃ sādareṇa ca // SatvT_4.27
GR14satvtanu:429: bāhupādādibhir viṣṇor vandanaṃ parayā mudā // SatvT_4.28
GR14satvtanu:432: āśu sampadyate bhaktiḥ kṛṣṇe bhāgavatī satī /
GR14satvtanu:434: svābhāvikī ratir abhūt sā vai bhāgavatī matā /
GR14satvtanu:435: etadbhaktiparo vipra cāturvargyaṃ na manyate // SatvT_4.31
GR14satvtanu:436: tasyām antaḥ sarvasukham adhikaṃ vāpi labhyate /
GR14satvtanu:439: sadguror upadeśena labdhvā satsaṅgam ādṛtaḥ // SatvT_4.33
GR14satvtanu:441: teṣv evaṃ kīrtanaṃ teṣāṃ manasā cāpi cintanam // SatvT_4.34
GR14satvtanu:443: yady aśakto bhavet kīrtau smaraṇe cāpi sarvaśaḥ // SatvT_4.35
GR14satvtanu:444: tadā tu bhagavannāmnām āvṛttau vṛttayet sadā /
GR14satvtanu:445: sadā śaśvat prītiyukto yaḥ kuryād etad anvaham // SatvT_4.36
GR14satvtanu:446: tasyāśu bhaktiḥ śrīkṛṣṇe jāyate sadbhir ādṛtā /
GR14satvtanu:447: evaṃ premamayīṃ labdhvā bhittvā saṃsāram ātmanaḥ // SatvT_4.37
GR14satvtanu:450: nānusaṃdhatta etā vai vinā bhaktiṃ janārdane /
GR14satvtanu:451: yady anyasādhanāny anyabhaktau kuryād atantritaḥ // SatvT_4.39
GR14satvtanu:452: na tatra kaścid doṣaḥ syād dharisevā yataḥ kṛtā /
GR14satvtanu:453: kiṃ tu yad bhaktiniṣṭhā syāt tām evāpnoti mānavaḥ // SatvT_4.40
GR14satvtanu:454: phalabhedena bhedaḥ syāt sādhanena na bhidyate /
GR14satvtanu:455: pṛthag eṣa mayākhyāto bhaktibhedaḥ sasādhanaḥ // SatvT_4.41
GR14satvtanu:457: sakāmaḥ saguṇo vipra bahudhokto maharṣibhiḥ // SatvT_4.42
GR14satvtanu:458: kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmy adya vada māṃ dvijasattama /
GR14satvtanu:460: vidheyaṃ kathitaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā me surasattama /
GR14satvtanu:461: niṣedhanīyaṃ kiṃ cātra bhaktistambhakaraṃ ca yat // SatvT_4.43
GR14satvtanu:466: niṣedhanīyaṃ tat tāsāṃ bhaktānāṃ puruṣottame // SatvT_4.45
GR14satvtanu:470: bhaktighnadoṣaṃ śṛṇu taṃ sarvathā varjanaṃ nṛṇām // SatvT_4.47
GR14satvtanu:472: premamayyāṃ satāṃ dveṣo bhaktināśakarā ime // SatvT_4.48
GR14satvtanu:474: dveṣeṇa narakaṃ yāti kurvan bhaktim api dvijaḥ // SatvT_4.49
GR14satvtanu:475: doṣadṛṣṭyā doṣavān syāt tatra doṣaphalaṃ bhavet /
GR14satvtanu:476: martyadṛṣṭyā kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ bhavet kuñjaraśaucavat // SatvT_4.50
GR14satvtanu:478: yayā bhaktir bhagavati hy añjasā syāt sukhāvahā // SatvT_4.51
GR14satvtanu:480: kāryā saiva tu tat sarvā bhagavadbhaktivardhinī // SatvT_4.52
GR14satvtanu:483: premamayyāṃ satāṃ prītyā śravaṇaṃ yaśasāṃ hareḥ /
GR14satvtanu:484: mukhyāḥ sādhanasampattyaḥ kathitās te dvijottama // SatvT_4.54
GR14satvtanu:486: yad vinā sravate bhaktir āmabhāṇḍāt payo yathā // SatvT_4.55
GR14satvtanu:489: vinā yena pumān yāti kurvan bhaktim api śramam // SatvT_4.56
GR14satvtanu:492: pariniṣṭhāśrayaṃ yad vai śaraṇaṃ parikīrtitam // SatvT_4.57
GR14satvtanu:493: etad vai trividhaṃ proktaṃ vedavidbhir dvijottama /
GR14satvtanu:494: prathamaṃ madhyamaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ kramaśaḥ śṛṇu tan mune // SatvT_4.58
GR14satvtanu:496: yad buddhiniṣṭhitaṃ kṛṣṇe kṛtaṃ tat prathamaṃ smṛtam // SatvT_4.59
GR14satvtanu:498: yan mamatvāśrayaṃ kṛṣṇe kṛtaṃ tan madhyamaṃ smṛtam // SatvT_4.60
GR14satvtanu:500: tat sarvaṃ kṛṣṇapādābje kṛtaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ prakīrtitam // SatvT_4.61
GR14satvtanu:501: īśvaraṃ tadadhīnaṃ ca taddharmaṃ ca sanātanam /
